name: Celestial Dream (Demo)
description:
Sometimes dreams aren't so far from reality...

Seraphina, a sheltered young girl, has been looking for something to improve her dull life. After her mother's mysterious disappearance years ago, her life has never been the same.

Things only get worse when her father and his new wife try to send Seraphina to an arranged marriage meeting.

Until she finds herself swept away and transported  to a fantasy realm with a bounty on her head!

Her only line of defence is a ragtag team of misfits whose personalities stray far from the word normal but what do you expect when werewolves, elves, witches, pixies, vampires and demons get involved!

Visit our website at: https://celestialdreams.wixsite.com/visualnovel
